## StatsClient.registerImageDisplay() method

Register an image display during the current session.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerImageDisplay(params: ImageStatsParams): Promise<Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ImageStatsParams</code> | An options object. See [ImageStatsParams](./doofinder.imagestatsparams.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Response>`

A promise to be fullfilled with the response or rejected with a `ClientResponseError`<!-- -->.
